hackathon-description-text: Prepare for a weekend filled with learning new technologies, pushing your limits, and making new friends. Students from all 4 UH universities are teaming up to create the University of Houston System's first major hackathon.
hackathon-rules:

Everything must be made during CodeRED, any resources used in hacks must be legally licensed and freely available to the public.
